data.name: ClassCircularDependency
data.value: Circular parent dependency involving the classes '{0}' and '{1}'. To fix this error, break the circular dependency by removing one of the attribute argument Parent or Children.

data.name: ClassHasNotHandler
data.value: The class '{0}' will not have a {1} (ignored) because it does not have a method with one of the following signatures: 'void Run()', 'int Run()', 'async Task RunAsync()', 'async Task<int> RunAsync()'. Optionally the method signature can have an CliContext parameter: 'Run(CliContext context)', 'RunAsync(CliContext context)'

data.name: ClassHasNotPublicDefaultConstructor
data.value: The class '{0}' must have a parameterless (default) and public/internal and non-static constructor to generate a {1} when not using dependency injection.

data.name: ClassNotNonAbstractNonGeneric
data.value: The class '{0}' must be a non-generic and non-abstract class to generate a {1}.

data.name: ClassNotPublicNonStatic
data.value: The class '{0}' will not generate a {1} (ignored) because it is not a public/internal and non-static class.

data.name: DelegateNotCorrect
data.value: The command as delegate must have a return type 'void' or 'int' and if it's async 'Task' or 'Task<int>'.

data.name: MethodNotNonGeneric

data.name: MethodNotPublicNonStatic

data.name: PropertyTypeEnumerableIsNotBindable
data.value: The property '{0}' has custom enumerable type '{2}' (other than supported CLR types) so it should have a a public constructor with a IEnumerable<T> or IList<T> parameter (other parameters, if any, should be optional), so that it can be bound/parsed as a {1} .

data.name: PropertyTypeIsNotBindable
data.value: The property '{0}' has custom type '{2}' (other than supported CLR types) so it should have a public constructor or a static 'Parse' method with a string parameter (other parameters, if any, should be optional), so that it can be bound/parsed as a {1} .

data.name: UnsupportedLanguage
data.value: Source generation currently supports only C# language in the consuming project.

data.name: UnsupportedLanguageVersion
data.value: Source generation requires at least C# version {0} in the consuming project. Please add <LangVersion>{0}</LangVersion> tag to your .csproj file.
